title: Sandese Aate Hain
info: Singers: Sonu Nigam, Roop Kumar Rathod

lines.indian: Ma Ga Re Ga Pa Ma
Re Sa Ni Dha Re Sa

lines.lyrics: Sandese aate hain, humein tadpaate hain
lines.indian: Pa Pa Pa Ga Re Ga | Pa Pa Pa Ga Re Ga

lines.lyrics: Jo chitthi aati hai, wo poochhe jaati hai
lines.indian: Pa Pa Pa Ga Re Ga | Pa Pa Pa Ga Re Ga

lines.lyrics: Ke ghar kab aaoge, ke ghar kab aaoge
lines.indian: Sa Sa Ni Dha Pa Dha Ni Dha Pa Dha
Sa Sa Ni Dha Pa Dha Ni Dha Pa Dha

lines.lyrics: Ke tum bin ye ghar soona, soona hai
lines.indian: Re Re Re Re Ga Ga Re Re Ga Ga Re Pa Ma Ga
